Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.AngleSensor

  • Packages that use AngleSensor 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.
    org.strongback.drive  
    org.strongback.hardware  

    • Uses of AngleSensor in org.strongback.components

      Subinterfaces of AngleSensor in org.strongback.components 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Compass
      A sensor that determines the positional heading, or angular displacement, in degrees.
      interface  Gyroscope
      A gyroscope is a device that measures angular velocity (in degrees per second) about a single axis.
      Methods in org.strongback.components that return AngleSensor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AngleSensor AngleSensor.create(DoubleSupplier angleSupplier)
      Create an angle sensor around the given function that returns the angle.
      default AngleSensor TalonSRX.getAngleSensor()
      Deprecated. 
      Use TalonSRX.getEncoderInput() instead.
      static AngleSensor AngleSensor.invert(AngleSensor sensor)
      Inverts the specified AngleSensor so that negative angles become positive angles.
      default AngleSensor AngleSensor.zero()
      Change the output so that the current angle is considered to be 0.
      Methods in org.strongback.components with parameters of type AngleSensor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AngleSensor AngleSensor.invert(AngleSensor sensor)
      Inverts the specified AngleSensor so that negative angles become positive angles.

    • Uses of AngleSensor in org.strongback.drive

      Constructors in org.strongback.drive with parameters of type AngleSensor 
      Constructor and Description
      MecanumDrive(Motor leftFront, Motor leftRear, Motor rightFront, Motor rightRear, AngleSensor gyro)
      Creates a new DriveSystem subsystem that uses the supplied drive train and no shifter.
      MecanumDrive(Motor leftFront, Motor leftRear, Motor rightFront, Motor rightRear, AngleSensor gyro, DoubleToDoubleFunction speedLimiter)
      Creates a new DriveSystem subsystem that uses the supplied drive train and optional shifter.

    • Uses of AngleSensor in org.strongback.hardware

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AngleSensor Hardware.AngleSensors.encoder(int aChannel, int bChannel, double distancePerPulse)
      Creates a new AngleSensor from an Encoder using the specified channels with the specified distance per pulse.

      Create a new AngleSensor from an AnalogPotentiometer using the specified channel and scaling.

      Create a new AngleSensor from an AnalogPotentiometer using the specified channel, scaling, and offset.
